setting: a forest with trees and a chalkboard
action: Craig writes on the chalkboard
camera_view: medium shot of Craig and the list
lighting: natural light filtering through trees
text: A daily reminder of friendships...

objects.description: a tattered piece of paper pinned to a notice board
a quill pen on the table next to the adventurer

action: SPEAKER_00 is attempting to recruit allies
lighting: warm, soft tavern lighting
text: "Want to make friends? Join my list... Pin my name here..."

action: A figure is rummaging through their backpack
camera_view: Close-up of the character's face, with a faint image of a forest behind them
lighting: Soft, natural light filtering through the trees above
text: "I've got a huge..."

characters.name: Eilif Stonefist
characters.portrait: A sturdy dwarf with an axe

action: Searching for a young adventurer
lighting: Dappled sunlight filtering through the trees
text: SPEAKER_00: Looking for a young stud... A young dry.ad...

setting: A dense forest with ancient trees
action: Two dryads are talking to each other, seemingly in a heated conversation.
camera_view: Medium shot with the two characters facing each other
lighting: Soft focus with dappled shadows from the trees above
text: "You dryads down the clo.wn.?"

action: SPEAKER_02 gestures towards the unfinished chair
lighting: dim, with shadows on the walls
text: And you have a hard time doing work that does not involve goblins and or skeletons... Tra,vis,, your carpentry is.... Nobody wants chairs nowa.day.s...

action: A patron leans against a wooden bar, contemplating the future of iron-based technology.
lighting: soft, warm glow from candles and fire pit
text:
SPEAKER_02: People are more into iron rot things...
SPEAKER_02: You know,, iron's going to go out...
SPEAKER_02: Yeah,...

setting: A dimly lit comic book store

objects.position: Shelves in the back of the store
On a display rack near the counter

action: Speaker_02 is browsing through old comic books
camera_view: Medium close-up, focusing on Speaker_02's face
lighting: Dim store lighting with a hint of color from the comics
text: "Go out of fashion... People will be back into .wick.er... Bronze age has got to end some,time,, right???"

setting: a forest floor with ancient wooden structures in the background

characters.name: Eilif Stonefist
characters.description: dressed in leather armor, holding a massive battle-axe

characters.name: Lila Earthsong
characters.description: wearing a cloak with leaves and vines embroidered on it, holding a shortbow and quiver

action: Eilif and Lila are standing back-to-back, looking around cautiously
camera_view: over-the-shoulder view of Eilif, with a slight tilt to include Lila's reaction
lighting: warm sunlight filtering through the trees above
text: "And then it's going to get retro back into wood..."

action: Conversation between patrons
lighting: Warm glow from lanterns and candles
text: Over drinks one night with Merle's cousin, whose name is... Shi.t..

setting: Fantasy realm with dense forest and towering trees

characters.name: SPEAKER_02
characters.description: A tired Dungeon Master flipping through a large booklet

action: SPEAKER_02 is scrolling through the pages of the campaign book, looking exasperated
camera_view: close-up on SPEAKER_02's face, with a hint of the booklet in the background
lighting: dim, with a warm glow from a nearby candle
text: "His name.... These names are out of control... I may eventually shed the booklet I'm going out of,"

setting: A dimly lit tavern, patrons murmuring in the background
action: Gundren approaches the group, eyeing them suspiciously
camera_view: Medium shot, focusing on Gundren's approach
lighting: Soft tavern lighting, casting warm shadows
text: "What brings you folks to Oakwood?"

action: SPEAKER_02 is speaking to the bartender
camera_view: medium shot, focused on SPEAKER_02's face
lighting: soft tavern lighting, warm glow
text: "Maybe you've had a few drink.s..."

action: SPEAKER_01 defends a fellow adventurer
lighting: warm tavern lighting
text: No,,, he can hold his own...

action: SPEAKER_01 is teasing SPEAKER_02 about the cider.
lighting: warm, tavern lighting

text.speaker: SPEAKER_02
lines: I mean, it's pretty weak as ciders go...

text.speaker: SPEAKER_01
lines: He's the Andrew WK of D.&.D...

setting: A dimly lit office with a large wooden desk

characters.name: Oversighter
characters.description: A stern-looking man in a suit

action: Oversighter is speaking to SPEAKER_02 and the others
camera_view: Medium shot of Oversighter with SPEAKER_02 in the background
lighting: Soft, overhead lighting with a hint of shadow
text: "You're right... Oversighter, he talks to you guys about an exciting opportunity... He seems pretty straight-laced..."

action: Speaking to a dwarf in a gruff manner
camera_view: Medium shot of SPEAKER_02 and the dwarf
lighting: Dim, with candles and lanterns lighting the tavern
text: "He seems like he's not giving you no bull shit..."

action: A figure hesitates to follow up.
lighting: dim torchlight
text: "That... Do it or I'll walk..."

action: SPEAKER_02 is listening to a low grunt
lighting: dim, cave-like lighting
text: "That's how he sounds..."

action: SPEAKER_02 is speaking to a friend in hushed tones
camera_view: medium shot, focusing on SPEAKER_02's face
lighting: warm tavern lighting, with a hint of shadow
text: "He has to offer you what he calls the last job you'll ever need to take..."

setting: A dimly lit tavern interior with patrons in the background
action: SPEAKER_02 is speaking to Mer.le in a hushed tone
camera_view: Medium shot, framing the conversation between the two characters
lighting: Soft, warm lighting from candles and lanterns
text: Maybe he's doing it as a favor to you,, Mer.le... Maybe he, uh, knows that you've had some hard times la.tely...

action: SPEAKER_02 speaking to Fantasy Jesus
lighting: dim, with candles on the table
text:
Yeah,,, the religion business is not good...
No.
People are not crazy about Fantasy, Jesus...

action: confused look on face
lighting: dim
text: "Who's your...?"

action: confrontation
lighting: dramatic shadows
text: SPEAKER_02: Who's your god??? Oh,,, that would be Mardhammer Dwi.n... I'm just gonna go with Dwi.n...

action: SPEAKER_02 is explaining the situation to the applicant
camera_view: medium shot, focusing on SPEAKER_02's face
lighting: soft overhead lighting
text: SPEAKER_02: He basically wants to audition you... To see if you are capable of handling.... So is this like a?....

action: SPEAKER_02 paces back and forth in front of a large stone door
camera_view: Medium shot, SPEAKER_02 centered in frame
lighting: Low-key, with hints of torchlight

action: Thinking deeply
camera_view: Medium shot, looking down at SPEAKER_02
lighting: Soft, dim dungeon lighting
text: "One that shows impotent .rage..."

action: Speech bubble released
lighting: Shadows cast on trees

action: Speaking to the party
lighting: Soft, natural light
text: Adventuring, essentially...

setting: a dimly lit tavern in the town of Neverwinter
action: SPEAKER_02 is speaking to the players
lighting: dimmly lit with lanterns and candles
text: From the..... The town of Never.w.inter...... Where the three of you are currently held up.......

setting: a fantasy world map with a distant town labeled Phan.dal.in
action: SPEAKER_02 is standing on a hilltop, pointing to the town of Phan.dal.in in the distance
camera_view: medium shot, focusing on SPEAKER_02's gesture
lighting: warm sunlight with long shadows across the landscape
text: To the town of Phan.dal.in... Which.... None of you have actually been to.....

objects.description: A wooden table with mugs and plates scattered on it
A counter with a tap behind it, serving ale to the patrons

action: SPEAKER_02 looks unsure about what to say next
camera_view: Medium shot of SPEAKER_02 from across the tavern table
lighting: Dim candles and firelight illuminate the room
text: "Uh..... But maybe you.... Um....."

action: A player rolls a d20 with an insult
camera_view: Medium shot of the two players at a table
lighting: Warm tavern lighting
text: "Because I'm not very intelligent..."

action: The player hesitates over a dice roll.
camera_view: Medium shot, focusing on the player's reaction
lighting: Soft, tavern lighting
text: "Uh..... It's actually a wisdom-based roll..."

setting: A dark cave with ancient stones and flickering torches
action: SPEAKER_02 is paused, looking confused
lighting: Dramatic shadows on the cave walls
text: "What you..... History.? Well,,, basically all those...."

action: Speaking words of sorrow
lighting: Soft, ambient
text: "No,,, I'm sorry..."

setting: A fantasy world with rolling hills and towering trees
action: SPEAKER_01 is eagerly anticipating their first roll in the fantasy world
lighting: Soft, natural light with a warm glow
text: "Can I roll???"

setting: A fantastical realm with rolling hills and misty forests
lighting: soft, diffused
text: SPEAKER_01: This magical fantasy world... / SPEAKER_02: What about Fall?ad?win??? / SPEAKER_02: It's Phan.dal.in...

action: Speaking and discussing the town's history
camera_view: Medium shot of two adventurers talking in an alleyway
lighting: Soft, natural light
text: "That Phandalin is an old mining town..." - SPEAKER_02

action: pointing at a ravaged area
lighting: soft, dim
text: They had a very productive motherlode operation going on there...

setting: Dark cave system with ancient mining tunnels
action: Explorers examining an old mine shaft
camera_view: Medium shot of the mine entrance
lighting: Dim, with flickering torches

text.dialogue: Do we know what they were mining???
Actually,, they were mining magical ores...
They found a deep magical vein within the earth...

setting: a medieval-style fantasy town in ruins
action: Orcs pillage and destroy a previously prosperous town
camera_view: A wide shot of the devastated town, with Speaker_02 in the foreground
lighting: grimy, with sun setting behind the smoke-filled sky
text: Speaker_02: ...But it was basically destroyed by a wave of orcs that swept over the land...

action: Gazing at the rebuilt vein
lighting: Dim, dungeon candlelight
text: Speaker_02: It's on the up and up now...It's sort of being re.built...So the vein is still there,, right???

action: Examining the old mine shaft
lighting: Dim, with flickering torches in the background

content: "The vein of magic ores still there.."

setting: A dusty, abandoned town with a few scattered buildings
action: Speaker_02 is describing the town's state to others
lighting: Dull sunlight, with shadows cast by broken buildings
text: "They don't have that economy anymore..."

setting: A dirty, rundown mining town in the wilderness
action: Gundren speaks to another character about the town being even worse than Deadwood
lighting: dim, with only a few candles lit in the mine cart

setting: A bustling town square in Fandolin
objects: a large stone reconstruction of a building
action: Merle and Gundren stand facing each other, engaged in conversation
lighting: warm golden light of late afternoon
text: SPEAKER_02: But Gundren seems very invested in that town...

setting: a dusty road with a wagon in the distance
action: SPEAKER_02 is pointing at the map
camera_view: medium shot, looking down at SPEAKER_02 and the messenger
lighting: overcast sky with indirect sunlight
text: "It's about a two, three day ride on a wa.gon..."

action: SPEAKER_02 looking ahead with a serious expression
lighting: dim moonlight filtering through the trees

bubble.content: Well,,, he's going to get it...

action: SPEAKER_02 is looking uncertainly at a figure in the shadows
lighting: Dim, with only faint moonlight illuminating the scene
text: "Well,,, you don.'.t...."

setting: A dimly lit tavern alleyway at dusk
action: Mer.le leans in, listening to SPEAKER_02's proposal
camera_view: Medium shot, focusing on the conversation between Mer.le and SPEAKER_02
lighting: Warm, golden light from torches flickering outside
text: "He has asked you basically to transport a wagon full of goods..."

action: Two adventurers stand at a map, planning their route.
lighting: Soft Natural Light
text: "From Neverwinter to Fa.ndo.lin... And it sounds like a pretty easy job,, but you never know..."

setting: A dimly lit chamber with ancient tomes and dusty artifacts
action: SPEAKER_02 is frantically rummaging through the shelves
lighting: warm candlelight
text: No,,, no,,, no...
We're going to get....
This is stage setting...

action: SPEAKER_01 asks if it's a game
lighting: dim

text.speaker: SPEAKER_01
text.dialogue: Is Dungeons & Dragons listening to you do ?exposition???

setting: Fantasy forest with towering trees and misty atmosphere
action: a pause in the conversation
camera_view: medium shot, focused on SPEAKER_02's face
lighting: soft natural light filtering through the trees
text: "Not for the most part... Okay... I got to...."

setting: A lush forest with tall trees and a small clearing
action: Planting a seed in the ground
camera_view: Close-up on the adventurer's hands as they plant the seed
lighting: Soft, natural light filtering through the trees above
text: "I've actually already planted this seed..."

action: NPC 02 is negotiating with a patron
lighting: warm, soft lighting
text: A piece?. Each. Which, I mean, I'm not your boss,, but that's not a lot of money...

setting: A dimly lit tavern from the past
action: The DM reveals a shocking truth to Player 01
camera_view: medium shot, focused on the players and DM
lighting: warm tavern lighting with shadows
text: "This actually did happen in the past..."

setting: A dimly lit tavern, shady characters huddled in the corner

characters.name: Speaker_02
characters.pose: leaning forward, eyes locked on listener

action: The speaker leans in closer to negotiate terms
mood: Suspenseful, with hints of danger lurking beneath the surface
camera_view: Medium shot, focusing on Speaker_02's intense gaze
lighting: Low-key lighting, emphasizing shadows and creating tension
text: Speaker_02: Yeah, payment on arrival, maybe you can try and negotiate...

objects: a worn leather pouch in Speaker_02's hand
action: Speaker_02 is handing the protagonist a small pouch
camera_view: medium shot, focusing on the pouch and the protagonists' reaction
lighting: dim streetlights casting long shadows
text: The payment's not great,, but the promise that the last job you'll ever need to do certainly did it for you...

action: Driving down a dusty road, questioning the driver's role.
camera_view: Medium shot of the cart on the road
lighting: Bright sunlight with shadows cast by trees
text: Am I driving the cart???

setting: Dungeon interior with stone walls and torches
action: SPEAKER_02: Do you really???
lighting: Warm torchlight with shadows on the walls

action: Speaking in hushed tones
lighting: Soft, dim interior lights
text:
SPEAKER_02: I do...
SPEAKER_01: You can be driving the car...
SPEAKER_02: So you can say...

characters.name: SPEAKER_02
characters.description: Party member with a hint of confusion

action: Party members questioning their transportation
camera_view: Medium shot, showing party members in conversation
lighting: Bright sunlight overhead

text.speaker: SPEAKER_02
text.speech: Did he give us a map???

text.speaker: SPEAKER_01
text.speech: Do we know how long of a ride it is???

action: The Dungeon Explorer pauses to think about the journey ahead
camera_view: Medium shot, eye level with the character
lighting: Soft, golden light from the setting sun
text: It'll be about two days...
